tech_news.title: Palworld is getting an official card game this summer - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Pocketpair has announced Palworld Official Card Game, which is, yes, an official card game based on the developer's monster catching survival game, Palworld.

tech_news.title: As roughly one-in-ten Arc Raiders players reset their characters, Embark Studios is looking for new ways to incentivise expeditions - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Arc Raiders' design director has spoken about the game's expedition system, and how the team is looking to improve it.

tech_news.title: "A sad end to a sad story" - fond Anthem farewells begin as BioWare's Destiny-like game reaches last day of operation - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Exactly when it'll be switched off remains unclear.

tech_news.title: Why the best way to understand the self is to build a robot one - Aeon
tech_news.description: In order to better understand our human nature, we must attempt to build a robot capable of robust subjective experiences

tech_news.title: AI can now 'see' optical illusions. What does it tell us about our own brains? - BBC
tech_news.description: Our eyes can frequently play tricks on us, but scientists have discovered that some artificial intelligence can fall for the same illusions.

tech_news.title: Maxis stresses "values have not changed" following $55bn EA acquisition - GamesIndustry.biz
tech_news.description: Developer provides update on Sims franchise, maintaining "single-player PC and console experiences will always be a part of its future"

tech_news.title: Google Photos may finally add a long-awaited video playback feature - Android Authority
tech_news.description: Google Photos could soon allow users to adjust the video playback speed, and even allow date separators to be toggled off for a cleaner view.
